happy to ensure your crochet project has the same cotton in colour a measurements as the pattern it is a good 1 ball of watg s shiny happy idea to make a gauge swatch before you cotton in colour b start a gauge swatch is a small sample of 1 ball of watg s shiny happy crochet where you count the stitches and cotton in colour c row and check them against the gauge 1 ball of watg s shiny happy given in the pattern if you get more cotton in colour d stitches/row than the pattern s gauge 1 ball of watg s shiny happy it means your crochet is tighter if you get cotton in colour e fewer stitches/row than the pattern your 1 sabrina sleeves pattern crochet is looser sometimes it works to 1 4 5mm crochet hook crochet tighter or looser to compensate 1 sewing needle at the end you may have to unravel your gauge swatch to make sure you have enough yarn to finish your piece double_crochet & chain stitch pattern 10 cm/4 = 19 stitches 10 cm/4 = 8 5 row single_crochet stitch 10 cm/4 = 16 stitches 10 cm/4 = 18 row we use us terminology in our crochet patterns you can find all techniques on page 25 pssst remember that you must not copy our patterns and sell or even give them away for
